original_title: Jag skall bli Sveriges Rembrandt eller dö!
overview: "I Will Become Sweden's Rembrandt or Die!" - About the life and art of the Swedish painter Ernst Josephson (1851-1906), his many travels in Europe and about the psychological crisis in 1885 which changed Josephson's artistry completely.
title: Jag skall bli Sveriges Rembrandt eller dö!
